name: Courthouse
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Can only be built [in annexed cities]
Unbuildable
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Cannot be purchased

name: Occupational Office
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Can only be built [in annexed cities]
Destroyed when the city is captured
Only available <in cities without a [Integrational Office]>
Only available <in cities without a [Patriation of Freedom]>
Only available <in cities without a [Labor Camp]>

name: Integrational Office
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Can only be built [in annexed cities]
Destroyed when the city is captured
Only available <after adopting [Freedom]>
Only available <in cities without a [Occupational Office]>
Only available <in cities without a [Patriation of Freedom]>
Only available <in cities without a [Labor Camp]>

name: Patriation of Freedom
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Can only be built [in annexed cities]
Destroyed when the city is captured
Only available <after adopting [Order]>
Only available <in cities without a [Occupational Office]>
Only available <in cities without a [Integrational Office]>
Only available <in cities without a [Labor Camp]>

name: Labor Camp
uniques: Remove extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Can only be built [in annexed cities]
Destroyed when the city is captured
Only available <after adopting [Autocracy]>
Only available <in cities without a [Occupational Office]>
Only available <in cities without a [Integrational Office]>
Only available <in cities without a [Patriation of Freedom]>
